text: In the second year of Darius the king, in the sixth month, on the first day of the month, the word of the Lord came by the hand of the prophet Agg√¶us, saying, Speak to Zorobabel the son of Salathiel, of the tribe of Juda, and to 1. 1 Or, Joshua.Jesus the son of Josedec, the high priest, saying,
